com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.EntityMapper

Uses of EntityMapper in com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase
 

Classes in com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase that implement EntityMapper
 class BaseEntityMapper<K,E>
          A base implementation of EntityMapper, that uses the provided EntitySerDe and KeyBuilderFactory to map Key/Entity pairs to HBase puts, and HBase results to KeyEntity pairs.
 

Methods in com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase that return EntityMapper
 EntityMapper<K,E> BaseDao.getEntityMapper()
          Gets the EntityMapper for this DAO.
